title:
Upper bounds for dimensions of singularity categories and their
  annihilators
abstract:
Let $R$ be a commutative noetherian ring. Denote by $\operatorname{mod} R$
the category of finitely generated $R$-modules and by $\operatorname{D^b}(R)$
the bounded derived category of $\operatorname{mod} R$. In this paper, we first
investigate localizations and annihilators of Verdier quotients of
$\operatorname{D^b}(R)$. After that, we explore upper bounds for the dimension
of the singularity category of $R$ and its (strong) generators. We extend a
theorem of Liu to the case where $R$ is neither an isolated singularity nor
even a local ring.
